title: Yamaha Motor Finance names new president, CEO - Boating Industry
content: Yamaha Motor Finance names new president, CEO  Boating Industry
description: Yamaha Motor Co., Ltd. (YMC), has announced that Craig Hewitt, Chief Operating Officer of YMFUS, will be promoted to President and CEO effective February 1, 2022. Hewitt joined Yamaha in 2020 to support the companyâ€™s continued growth in the Powersports and Marine segments. Prior to joining Yamaha, he served as CEO of Carfinance.com, a direct-to-consumer ...
